It doesn't work, there was no pc version, i think it runs emulated but i've only managed to go the menus by pressing "enter". Then i press all buttons and it doesn't start.

@motley666

you only use 4 buttons D,X,A and backspace

D for enter
X for Jumping
A for sliding
backspace for Previous menu
and for a higher jump hold up arrow and X for jumping
